title: Taiwan says China military drills appear to simulate attack
content:
1. Taiwan says China military drills appear to simulate attack  The Associated Press
  2. The last time there was a Taiwan crisis, China’s military was outmatched by U.S. forces. Not now.  NBC News
  3. Taiwan says multiple Chinese aircraft and vessels spotted in possible simulated attack  CNN
  4. Across the sea from Taiwan, Chinese tourists await island's 'return'  Reuters
  5. Chinese military drills appear to simulate attack, Taiwan says as fallout from Pelosi visit goes on  NBC News
contentSnippet:
Taiwan says China military drills appear to simulate attack  The Associated Press
The last time there was a Taiwan crisis, China’s military was outmatched by U.S. forces. Not now.  NBC News
Taiwan says multiple Chinese aircraft and vessels spotted in possible simulated attack  CNN
Across the sea from Taiwan, Chinese tourists await island's 'return'  Reuters
Chinese military drills appear to simulate attack, Taiwan says as fallout from Pelosi visit goes on  NBC News

localize.title: 台湾、中国の軍事訓練は攻撃を模擬しているように見えると発表
台湾称中国军事演习似乎是在模拟攻击
臺灣稱中國軍事演習似乎是在模擬攻擊
